Home.desc: Opaj Consulting Inc specializes in providing professional services for managing Enterprise JD Edwards upgrade, implementation projects and support. We use proven tools, a time-tested project plan and leading industry processes. We can significantly reduce project risks while ensuring that the maximum business benefits are achieved.
Home.features: JDE EnterpriseOne, JDE World, IQ4BIZ, UPK, Support, Training

Services.list: JD Edwards Enterprise Solutions, Business Intelligence Services, JD EnterpriseOne, JD Edwards World, IQ4BIZ, UPK
Services.desc: We are a value shop focused on providing professional services which includes Pre-Implementation Assessment & Evaluation, Implementation, Sizing, Upgrade, Migration, Reactive & Proactive Help Desk Support, Performance Tuning,Optimization, Technology & Database Support, Integration, Development & Customizations and Post-Implementation Audit.
